In this mind-blowing sequel to the Shaw Brother's huge horror hit, it's Zombigeddon! Mysterious zombies run amok while baffled doctors try to find out why. The zombies vomit, melt, spontaneously combust, explode and may be abducting the local lady folk. While the doctors look for a natural cause, the real cause appears to be supernatural. Released on VHS in the U.S. as Revenge of the Zombies.
